name: Goat Match
description:
Objective

Match 3 or more of the same coloured blocks to remove them prevent the blocks from overflowing the grid.

Controls

Up to send block into time portal

Z,X to rotate block

left, right to move the block left and right

Down to send block downwards


Credits

Art by: Melinda Stewart

Sound by: Mark Sparling

Programming and Design by: James Brownlee
